gaia::media::OverlayFrame Class Reference

This class is used to overlay an image on top of a media item. More...

Detailed Description

This class is used to overlay an image on top of a media item.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

gaia::media::OverlayFrame::OverlayFrame ( const MediaItem &  mediaItem,
const base::String &  overlayId,
const graphics::Bitmap &  bitmap,
int64_t  startTimeMs,
int64_t  durationMs 
)

Constructor for an OverlayFrame.

Parameters:
mediaItemThe media item owner
overlayIdThe overlay id
bitmapThe bitmap to be used as an overlay. The size of the bitmap must equal to the size of the media item to which it is added. The bitmap is typically a decoded PNG file.
startTimeMsThe overlay start time in milliseconds
durationMsThe overlay duration in milliseconds
gaia::media::OverlayFrame::OverlayFrame ( const MediaItem &  mediaItem,
const base::String &  overlayId,
const base::String &  filename,
int64_t  startTimeMs,
int64_t  durationMs 
)

Constructor for an OverlayFrame.

This constructor can be used to restore the overlay after it was saved internally by the video editor.

Parameters:
mediaItemThe media item owner
overlayIdThe overlay id
filenameThe file name that contains the overlay.
startTimeMsThe overlay start time in milliseconds
durationMsThe overlay duration in milliseconds
